subject: Athletics and Sports
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: One of the youngest coaches in Division I college basketball, Butler’s Brad Stevens, 31, tries to maintain a modest, even-keeled demeanor while leading the 12-1 Bulldogs to a spot in the top 25.
snippet: One of the youngest coaches in Division I college basketball, Butler’s Brad Stevens, 31, tries to maintain a modest, even-keeled demeanor while leading the 12-1 Bulldogs to a spot in the top 25.
